name: neuralwork/arxiver
description: The Arxiver dataset is a substantial collection of 63,357 arXiv papers, transformed into multi-markdown (.mmd) format. This dataset offers a wealth of information, including original arXiv article IDs, titles, abstracts, authors, publication dates, URLs, and corresponding markdown files. It encompasses a wide variety of topics published between January 2023 and October 2023, making it a valuable resource for numerous applications such as semantic search, domain-specific language modeling, question answering, and summarization.
citeAs: @misc{acar_arxiver2024,   author = {Alican Acar, Alara Dirik, Muhammet Hatipoglu},   title = {ArXiver},   year = {2024},   publisher = {Hugging Face},   howpublished = {\url{https://huggingface.co/datasets/neuralwork/arxiver}} }
creator: neuralwork
keywords: Semantic Search, Language Modeling, Question Answering, Summarization
task: Text Classification, Information Extraction, Question Answering
